meanings.definition: The quality or state of being wacky.
meanings.sent1: Her wackiness always brings a smile to everyone's face.
meanings.sent2: The party was full of wackiness and laughter.
meanings.sent3: His wackiness in wearing mismatched socks made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The wackiness of the situation was like a colorful painting come to life.
meanings.sent5: The wackiness of the clown's performance was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Behavior or actions that are eccentric or unconventional.
meanings.sent1: The comedian's wackiness kept the audience entertained throughout the show.
meanings.sent2: She embraced her wackiness and stood out from the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The wackiness of his dance moves made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: In a world of seriousness, her wackiness was a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent5: The wackiness of his inventions amazed everyone around him.
